name: Ciprofloxacin

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A CORN

contraindications.text: ciprofloxacin tablets administered orally described appropriate guidelines tables .

warningsAndPrecautions: ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 250 mg available round , white film-coated tablets debossed “ y101 ” one side . ciprofloxacin tablets , usp 500 mg available oval shaped , white film-coated tablets , debossed “ y102 ” one side . imprinted y102 . bottles 6 tablets ndc 68788-8692-0 bottles 10 tablets ndc 68788-8692-8 bottles 14 tablets ndc 68788-8692-1 bottles 20 tablets ndc 68788-8692-2 bottles 30 tablets ndc 68788-8692-3 store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . preserve well-closed container .
contraindications_original: Ciprofloxacin tablets should be administered orally as described in the appropriate Dosage Guidelines tables.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 250 mg are available as round, white film-coated tablets debossed with “Y101” on one side.
                  Ciprofloxacin Tablets, USP 500 mg are available as oval shaped, white film-coated tablets, debossed with “Y102” on one side. Imprinted with Y102.
                  Bottles of 6 Tablets	NDC 68788-8692-0
                  
                  Bottles of 10 Tablets	NDC 68788-8692-8
                  
                  Bottles of 14 Tablets	NDC 68788-8692-1
                  
                  Bottles of 20 Tablets	NDC 68788-8692-2
                  
                  Bottles of 30 Tablets	NDC 68788-8692-3
                  
                  Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Preserve in well-closed container.
